title: Travelodge's Christmas sale has rooms from £29 but you need to be quick
text:

Travelodge is giving Brits the chance to bag cheap hotel rooms for 2019 in a brand new sale for the Christmas period.

Ideal for those travelling across the country to visit loved ones, or hoping to book in a Christmas shopping break ahead of the big day, the sale includes rooms from £29 a night!

For a family of four, that works out at just £7.25pp when sharing a family room, a budget-friendly alternative to cramming into your relative's spare room or air beds on the floor.

The discounted rooms are already on sale on the Travelodge website and there are 568 UK hotels to choose from so you'll be spoiled for choice of destination.

There's also quite a generous window of travel dates with the discounts valid on stays between the 1st November 2019 through to the 15th January 2020.

However, if you find the ideal bargain for you then you may want to snap it up quickly - there are only 500,000 rooms up for grabs in the offer and once they're gone, that's it.

Don't be disheartened if you miss out or can't quite make the deal work for you.

We've rounded up the best Travelodge deals and discounts worth knowing about year-round, including top tips on nabbing the cheapest rates.

Then of course there are plenty of extra ways to save the pennies when you're staying at one of the hotels.

For a start, Travelodge hotels which feature an on-site Bar Café offer breakfast, lunch and dinner menus, and there are tempting meal deals for families.

For example, you can choose from an Unlimited Breakfast menu at £8.25pp or an unlimited lighter breakfast option at £5.95pp - and for each paying adult, two children eat for free.

You can also find dinner deals from £12.25 which includes a main plus a starter, side or dessert. (Prices can vary depending on the hotel where you are staying).
description: Travelodge has launched a Christmas sale with rooms from £29 for the festive period but be quick if you want a bargain
